verses.roman:
murārike kahe tumi kṛṣṇa vaśa kailā
śuniyā murāri śloka kahite lāgilā

synonyms: murārike—unto Murāri; kahe—says; tumi—you; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; vaśa—satisfied; kaila—made; śuniyā—hearing; murāri—of the name Murāri; śloka—verse; kahite—to speak; lāgila—began.
translation: Lord Caitanya then praised Murāri Gupta, saying, "You have satisfied Lord Kṛṣṇa." Hearing this, Murāri Gupta quoted a verse from Śrīmad-Bhāgavatam.
